title: Proof of the Satisfiability Conjecture for Large k.
abstract: We establish the satisfiability threshold for random k-SAT for all k ≥ k 0 . That is, there exists a limiting density α s (k) such that a random k-SAT formula of clause density α is with high probability satisfiable for α  s , and unsatisfiable for α > α s . The satisfiability threshold α s  is given explicitly by the one-step replica symmetry breaking (1SRB) prediction from statistical physics. We believe that our methods may apply to a range of random constraint satisfaction problems in the 1RSB class.
